short_summary: The Buying Centre Canada requires the services of a Web Multi-Media Content Consultant to assist with the improvement of several regulatory applications
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
# TBIPS A.16 Web Multi-Media Content Consultant
===============

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* **Name**: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)
* **Address**: 45 Alderney Drive, Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N6
* **Contact**: Alyssa Festeryga, alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca, (902) 201-4251

**Tender Information**
----------------------

* **Solicitation Number**: 5000071125
* **Reference Number**: CB-6715-60626982
* **Publication Date**: June 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 18, 2023, 15:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Regulations**
--------------

* Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires experienced specialists in user experience (UX) to assist the ECCC UX Team with improving several regulatory applications and initiating the development of two new applications:

### Application 1: Greenhouse Gas Reporting Platform (GHG RP) redesign

### Application 2: Landfill Methane Reduction Project

**Notice Documents**
-------------------

The tender documents can be found at:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6715/5000071125_npp.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6715/5000071125_npp_a001.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6715/500007
